attributes.action: that submariners do not pay food and accom when along side thus making submarine worth having
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: while along side submarine pay food and accom charges making submarine pay not worth while for newer submariners in conparison with there general service counterparts who pay no such charges and get ULA for living onboard there ships.or put the submarine pay up by more than the 2% on the table

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
